definition: abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)
If you want to condemn sb, don't worry about the pretext (idiom, from Zuozhuan 左傳|左传); one can always trump up a charge against sb/Give a dog a bad name, then hang him.
pinyin: yu4 jia1 zhi1 zui4 , he2 huan4 wu2 ci2

sentences.english: Combined with these, as if to cast a Rosewood had more mystery.
sentences.chinese: 加之這些，好像給紫檀木蒙上了一曾更加神祕的色彩。

sentences.english: And though much is made of the steam engine, ice scarcely merits a mention.
sentences.chinese: 加之儘管蒸汽機制成了許多東西，但冰簡直不值一提。

sentences.english: Adds Anlushan Rebellion's reason, causes Tang Dynasty's national strength to decline day after day.
sentences.chinese: 加之安史之亂的原因，使唐朝的國力日漸衰退。

sentences.english: Dreiser's work is the truth of feeling, and of incident.
sentences.chinese: 德萊塞的作品是感情上的真實，加之情節也真實。

sentences.english: Backlogs and bureaucracy means the process can take years.
sentences.chinese: 案例積壓加之官僚主義造成移民程序長達數年之久。

sentences.english: In addition, because modern dance encourages improvisation from the dancers.
sentences.chinese: 加之現代舞的訓練提倡舞者的即興創造。

sentences.english: Add eye contact to all of these and she will melt.
sentences.chinese: 給所有的這些技巧加之以眼神交流，她會融化了的。

definition: due to/as a result of/thanks to/owing to/since/because
plus/to put in/to add/to add on/to add into/in addition/on top of that
therefore/as a result/thus/and as a result, ...
and/moreover/yet/for the time being/to be about to/both (... and...)
